reviewText: Purchased a few weeks ago for our kids and they loved it. Very happy with it. Oldie but a goodie.

I got this to replace a very old, used copy.  For children it is a must.  Even though it is VHS if you have children and have a VHS still it is worth getting for the values and the fun as only Carman can bring to life.  Those of us who are older and were teens in the 80's and grew up with him will still adore it.
